quiz.pregunta: 1.What is the supreme law of the land?
quiz.respuesta: The Constitution

quiz.pregunta: 2. What does the Constitution do?
quiz.respuesta: Sets up the government.Defines the government.Protects basic rights of Americans

quiz.pregunta: 3.The idea of self-government is in the first three words of the Constitution.What are these words?
quiz.respuesta: We the People

quiz.pregunta: 4.What is an amendment?
quiz.respuesta: A change (to the Constitution).An addition (to the Constitution)

quiz.pregunta: 1.What is the supreme law of the land?
quiz.respuesta: The Constitution.The Bible.Robinson Crusoe

quiz.pregunta: 2.What does the Constitution do?
quiz.respuesta: Budget the government.Protects basic rights of Americans

quiz.pregunta: 3.The idea of self-government is in the first three words of the Constitution.What are these words?
quiz.respuesta: Me the President.We the People

quiz.pregunta: 4.What is an amendment?
quiz.respuesta: A fix in the Goverment.A change to the Constitution.A mistake in the Constitution

quiz.pregunta: 5.What do we call the first ten amendments to the Constitution?
quiz.respuesta: The Rights of the People.The Right things.The Bill of Rights

quiz.pregunta: 6.What is one right or freedom from the First Amendment?
quiz.respuesta: Church.Citizenship.Speech

quiz.pregunta: 7.How many amendments does the Constitution have?
quiz.respuesta: seven(7).twenty-seven(27).twenty(20).thirty-seven(37)

quiz.pregunta: 8.What did the Declaration of Independence do?
quiz.respuesta: Announced our independence (from Great Britain).Declared our Constitution.Said that the United States is free (from the Black Death)

quiz.pregunta: 9.What are two rights in the Declaration of Independence?
quiz.respuesta: Liberty and Progress.Life and pursuit of happiness

quiz.pregunta: 10.What is freedom of religion?
quiz.respuesta: You can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.You can be a chatolic or a baptist

quiz.pregunta: 11.What is the economic system in the United States?
quiz.respuesta: Capitalist economy.Socialist economy

quiz.pregunta: 12.What is the “rule of law”?
quiz.respuesta: Everyone knows the law.Leaders must discuss about the law.Government does not have to obey the law.No one is above the law

quiz.pregunta: 13.Name one branch or part of the government
quiz.respuesta: Health.Executive.Republican party

quiz.pregunta: 14.What stops one branch of government from becoming too powerful ?
quiz.respuesta: Patriotism.The President.Separation of Powers

quiz.pregunta: 15.Who is in charge of the executive branch ?
quiz.respuesta: The Vice President.The President.The Speaker of the House

quiz.pregunta: 16.Who makes federal laws?
quiz.respuesta: Congress.The President.The Army

quiz.pregunta: 17.What are the two parts of the U.S.Congress?
quiz.respuesta: The President and the Senate.The Senate and House of Representatives.The Goverment and the Army

quiz.pregunta: 18.How many U.S.Senators are there?
quiz.respuesta: One hundred (100).Four hundred thirty-five (435)
